name: Lyrics Search App
desc: Developed a dynamic Lyrics Search App using ReactJS and Bootstrap, fetching real-time data from the Musicxmatch API.

name: Nearby
desc: Developing an app that helps users see the history and facts of any place they're in.

name: Soccer Filtering System
desc: Developed a tool to enable users to filter soccer matches by teams, players and leagues using APIs

name: BeatLabs
desc: Creating an app that helps musicians convert voice to musical instrumentals.

name: Food Delivery Application
desc: Developed a food delivery app that helps drivers and customers using Java, Dart, Python, and MySQL. Employed Agile methodologies using Jira.

name: City Tracing
desc: Utilized WebGL and JavaScript to make a project that ray traces a scene of a city using a JSON file.

name: MusicFusion
desc: Full-Stack music platform allowing accesss to SoundCloud and Spotify. Made using React.js, Redux, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB

name: Animation Nation
desc: An app that gives the user a list of animations to choose from. Each item chosen will use a unique screen transition animation to a second screen that simulates Android Fragments

name: KnowItAll ChatBot
desc: An interactive chatbot powered by the advanced AI capabilities of ChatGPT-4.

name: Animated Bar Charts
desc: Created animated text-based bar charts in C++ by reading from text data files.

name: MoviePitch
desc: An AI-driven movie pitch generator that crafts character-driven narratives and recommends apt actors, all wrapped up with a catchy title.

name: Around The World
desc: An Augmented Reality souvenir: a virtual knickknack that morphs to represent various travel destinations, while smartly displaying real-time weather and time of the location.

name: OpenStreet Map
desc: Developed a console-based C++ program utilizing a custom-built graph class and Dijkstras algorithm to navigate between buildings via footways

name: Baccarat Game
desc: Implemented full stack Baccarat game using Java sockets, showcasing expertise in frontend and backend development.

name: Amazon Clone
desc: Static front-end clone of Amazon built with React and firebase. Lets users sign in and browse products.

name: Disney+ Clone
desc: Developed a front-end clone of Disney+ using React and Firebase. Lets users sign in and browse popular, new and recommended movies/shows.

name: Spotify Clone
desc: Static front-end clone of Spotify built with React and Firebase. Lets users sign in and browse various playlists and songs.

name: Youtube Audio Downloader
desc: Developed a simple tool to download mp4 youtube videos and convert to audio mp3 files using Python.

name: Grocery List App
desc: An app that allows users to add and delete to a grocery list. Utilized Firebase database and has dark/light modes.
